did.abstract: Collection consists of copies of wills of Samuel and William Weldon of Halifax County, N.C., dated respectively, 1779 May 16, and 1785 March 4; two letters written in 1837 and 1839 by James L.G. Baker in Florida Territory to his daughter Emily T. Baker; 1841 letter addressed to Emily by her husband A. Hall, a physician; 1843 letter from L.G. Baker to his wife, Mrs. Sarah Anne Baker, in Scotland Neck, also written in the Florida Territory; and a certificate granting William Weldon Hall permission to practice law in North Carolina.
